title: Stylish Escape in the Heart of Auckland with Daily Breakfast
description:
Have the best of Auckland at your fingertips with an elegant stay at Stamford Plaza Auckland, located right in the heart of the CBD. Push open the hotel’s doors and have the city at your feet: you will be positioned just a leisurely stroll away from vibrant Viaduct Harbour, as well as the iconic Sky Tower, and the bars and restaurants of Ponsbony Road.

Your city escape includes daily breakfast, a bottle of wine on arrival, discounted valet parking at $40 per night, 20% discount on food and drinks at any of the hotel’s restaurants and bars, and a leisurely late 1pm checkout.  

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details)

title: Experience Wellington’s Newest Hotel
description: Discover the vibrant delights of New Zealand’s capital city Wellington - the coolest little capital in the world! Stay at the newest hotel in town - Park Hotel Wellington. Luxury Escapes’ first ever Wellington offer is located in the heart of the CBD with fabulous restaurants, bars, the famous Wellington Cable Car, Te Papa Museum and Wellington Harbour right on your doorstep. Spend two nights in a Standard Room with daily breakfast, welcome drink for two, complimentary parking and a late 1pm checkout. Only $279 for two, valued up to $566.
location_description: Park Hotel Wellington [206573] Park Hotel Wellington 2017

title: Luxury Lodge Tranquility in New Zealand's Marlborough Sounds
description: Head off the grid and discover absolute serenity staying at the five-star Bay of Many Coves in Marlborough Sounds, New Zealand. Surrounded by awe-inspiring scenery and natural beauty, this eleven room boutique hotel provides guests with a secluded retreat accessible by boat or helicopter only. Spend three nights in a Luxury One Bedroom Apartment featuring a huge private deck overlooking the breathtaking cove and enjoy daily à la carte breakfasts, return boat transfers, nightly dinners including a seven-course degustation, and more for only $999 per person (twin share), valued up to $3,765.
location_description: Bay of Many Coves Resort [204108] Luxury Lodge Tranquillity in New Zealand's Malrborough Sounds

title: Queenstown's Most Luxurious Lodge
description: Whisk somebody special away on an unforgettable romantic escape to the picturesque Matakauri Lodge, an award-winning luxury lodge nestled on the edge of Lake Wakatipu, New Zealand, just seven minutes from Queenstown. Indulge in gourmet cuisine expertly crafted from fresh local produce and relax amid outstanding natural beauty at this beautiful lakeside retreat. Enjoy three nights in a Lodge Room, daily breakfasts, pre-dinner drinks and canapés and nightly degustation, a la carte or private dining experiences for two adults, plus one relaxing massage for one person to enjoy for just $2,999, valued up to $4,565. Watch the video below.

title: Romantic Five-Star Bayside Escape in New Zealand
description: Discover a serene seaside getaway at the award-winning, five-star Waoku Lodge at beautiful Whale Bay, Raglan, New Zealand. Spend three nights/four days in a deluxe apartment - featuring a private spa pool and beautiful ocean or garden views - with a complimentary local food hamper on arrival and a gift pack with local products for just $849 for two adults, valued up to $1,430. Check out the video below.
location_description: Waoku Lodge [205306] Romantic Five-Star Bayside Escape in New Zealand

title: Five-Star Victorian Heritage Stay in the Heart of Dunedin with Daily Breakfast
description:
Soak up Dunedin's impressive historic architecture with a stay at the elegant Fable Dunedin, a beautifully restored Victorian manor offering unparalleled elegance and luxury facilities in a prime location.

A boutique, private haven of 50 architecturally designed rooms, Fable Dunedin's design is inspired by Scottish settlers with traditional tartan accents. There's something for everyone to love at this luxe hotel, from the renowned The Press Club restaurant - which pays homage to Dunedin's original 1870s haunt for editors and publishers - to the outstanding service and central location within walking distance of The Octagon, the focal point of the city with bars, theatres and nearby, the Speight's Brewery.

title: Grand Opening in the Heart of Wellington's Entertainment Precinct
description: Discover Wellington's creative culture and gourmet dining fueled by craft beer, wine and aromatic coffee with a stay at the brand new Oaks Wellington Hotel, perched in the heart of the city's vibrant entertainment precinct. Be among the first to experience this refurbished cosmopolitan property - originally built in 1922 and reinvigorated in 2019 - and sample Wellington's legendary gourmet scene, said to have more bars, cafés and restaurants per capita than New York City. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival, NZ$20 hotel credit to use onsite and guaranteed 1pm late checkout, all while staying in an upgraded Executive Room.
offer_address: 89 Courtenay Place, Te aro, Wellington WLG 6011 New Zealand

title: Boutique Hanmer Springs Château Just 90 Minutes from Christchurch with Daily Breakfast
description:
Surrounded by nine acres of spectacular gardens and shadowed by the rambling hills of the sprawling Southern Alps, Hanmer Springs Hotel offers a serene hideaway in the heart of one of New Zealand’s most iconic resort towns. Only a short walk from the town centre and 90 minutes from Christchurch Airport, this boutique South Island château escape has everything you need to soak in the stunning natural beauty and steaming thermal pools of Hanmer Springs. Breathe in the fresh alpine air and relax outdoors at the onsite swimming pool, sundeck and tennis court, then enjoy a mouthwatering meal al fresco or cosied up beside a roaring fire at Hanmer Spring Hotel's in-house restaurant, a local favourite which showcases fresh produce prepared with modern Italian flair.

When you’re ready to explore one of New Zealand’s best alpine gems, you’re only a short stroll from a world of adventure and indulgence. The region’s wealth of sky-scraping mountains, ancient forests and artisanal shops and cafés are sure to delight, but a trip to the famous Hanmer Springs Thermal Pools and Spa should not be missed - its collection of rock pools, sulphur pools and hydroslides make for an unforgettable day.
offer_address: 1 Conical Hill Rd Hanmer Springs 7334 New Zealand

title: Ultimate Boutique Luxury in New Zealand’s Iconic Marlborough Region
description: Treat yourself to the ultimate luxury gourmet food and wine escape in New Zealand’s beautiful Marlborough wine region. Spend an idyllic four days/ three nights at The Marlborough Lodge, a premium new boutique hotel and estate nestled in 16 acres of lush parklands, with daily à la carte breakfasts, multi-course gourmet dinners each evening, a full-day tour of local wineries with a Marlborough Sounds cruise, a bottle of wine and more for just $2,499 for two adults, valued up to $5,073.
location_description: The Marlborough Lodge [196819] Ultimate Boutique Luxury in New Zealand’s Iconic Marlborough
offer_address: 776 Rapaura Rd, Blenheim 7273, New Zealand Blenheim

vendor_name: On the Point - Lake Rotorua (Previously Peppers)
title: Stunning Lodge Glamour in Rotorua, New Zealand
description: Exquisite views and award-winning chef prepared cuisine in New Zealand's famous Rotorua region. Stay three days/two nights at Peppers on the Point with daily breakfasts, a multi-course dining experience including canapés, drinks and four-course dinner, two 30-minute massage treatments, plus a bottle of local wine and chocolates on arrival. Explore the region's thermal springs, walking tracks, cultural activities and more. Only $999 for two adults, valued up to $2,372.
location_description: Peppers on the Point Lake Rotorua [202965] Stunning Lodge Glamour in Rotorua, New Zealand*

title: Romantic New Zealand Winery Escape
description: Discover the picturesque Martinborough wine region in New Zealand - part of the Classic New Zealand Wine Trail - known for its idyllic collection of boutique, family-run wineries and only one hours’ drive from Wellington. Spend three days/two nights at the iconic Martinborough Hotel and be within walking distance to some of the region's best wineries. Plus enjoy a NZ$100 dining credit, a nightly drink for each adult, late 1pm checkout and much more. Only $299 for two, valued up to $596.
location_description: The Martinborough Hotel [198716] Romantic New Zealand Winery Escape

title: Stylish Central Auckland Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Have the best of Auckland at your fingertips with an elegant stay at Stamford Plaza Auckland, located right in the heart of the CBD. Push open the hotel’s doors and have the city at your feet: you will be positioned just a leisurely stroll away from vibrant Viaduct Harbour, as well as the iconic Sky Tower, and a short drive from the bars and restaurants of Ponsonby Road.

Your city escape includes daily breakfast, a nightly drink per person at the sophisticated KOA Lobby Bar, discounted valet parking at $40 per night, 20% discount on food and drinks at any of the hotel’s restaurants and bars, and a leisurely late 1pm checkout.

title: The Best Views in New Zealand
description: Leave it all behind for the awe-inspiring natural beauty of Lake Pukaki, located between Queenstown and Christchurch in New Zealand’s South Island. Relax and unwind whilst soaking up some of New Zealand’s best views - including stunning views of Mount Cook - with four days/three nights at the spectacularly-located Lakestone Lodge. Enjoy daily à la carte breakfasts, a three-course dinner, a 30-minute massage each and an unforgettable star-gazing tour for only $999 for two adults, valued up to $2,035.
offer_address: 4589, Tekapo-Twizel Rd, Lake Pukaki, Twizel 7944, New Zealand Twizel

title: Historic Boutique Escape in Queenstown
description: Soak up the beauty of New Zealand’s South Island, staying in a boutique hotel just steps from the heart of Queenstown and the beautiful Lake Wakatipu. Relax and unwind at Hulbert House, a beautifully restored villa dating back to the Victorian era which features just six elegant suites, all offering scenic views across the lake, gardens or Skyline Hill. Enjoy three nights in a Premium Suite with daily breakfasts and pre-dinner drinks and canapés each evening for just $1,499 for two adults, valued up to $2,800.

title: Contemporary Escape in the Heart of Auckland near Iconic Sky Tower
description:
The best of Auckland is at your fingertips with a stay at the elegant Stamford Plaza Auckland, located right in the heart of the city. Positioned just a stroll away from vibrant Viaduct Harbour, you'll be able to explore the iconic Sky Tower, as well as the vibrant bars and restaurants of Ponsonby Road just a short drive away. Sip a cocktail at the wharfside bars and restaurants of the CBD or head out for a daytrip through New Zealand’s spectacular scenery and indulge in fine wines and delicious food in local wineries.

Nature and cosmopolitan city life collide in Auckland - the gateway to the striking landscapes and incredible nature of the country's North Island. Take a short ferry ride to the stunning Waiheke Island, where you will find a plethora of fabulous wineries, nature-based adventures, and breathtaking beaches. Rest easy after days of adventures in your premium hotel, offering unparalleled views over the city along with a whirlpool spa, heated pool, and its own teppanyaki restaurant.
